MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL20 postcode area of Llangollen, affecting properties in Y Maes and surrounding areas. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.48PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 5PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 2.14PM on 20th October 2020
